#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int gcd(int a, int b) {
    while(a>0 && b>0) {
        (a>b) ?(a%=b):(b%=a);
    }
    return a+b;
}

int main() {
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--) {
        int n, m;
        scanf("%d %d", &n, &m);
        printf("%d\n", m-gcd(n, m));
    }
}
